# rustfs Provider

Provider to access with RustFS

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "scaffolding" {
  # example configuration here
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `access_key` (String) Username or access key
- `access_secret` (String, Sensitive) Secret to be used as pass
- `endpoint` (String) RUSTFS server endpoint in the format host:port

### Optional

- `insecure` (Boolean) Insecure skip SSL validation
- `ssl` (Boolean) Use SSL transport
